    Socket Programming With Php

    To understand Socket Programming(SP) you have to understand Network Communication fundamental first and I assume that you already read it. :) Here’s a simple script for sending messages back and forth between a server and client. At this point, the code is fairly rough because once it enters the while loop, it doesn’t stop but it can be modified and fixed.(TCP/IP) Example. The Server error_reporting(E_ALL); $address = "127.0.0.1"; $port = "10000"; $mysock = socket_create(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, SOL_TCP); socket_bind($mysock, $address, $port); socket_listen($mysock, 5); $client = socket_accept($mysock); echo "Server started, accepting connections...\n"; $i = 0; while (true == true) { $i++; echo "Sending...
